# NIDLTDOACoordinatesType.geodetic

**Case**

A coordinate type that specifies a latitude, longitude, and altitude triplet.

## Declaration

```swift
case geodetic
```

## Discussion

When the coordinate type ([doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NIDLTDOAMeasurement/coordinatesType]) for a given measurement ([doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NIDLTDOAMeasurement]) is this option, the value of the measurement’s [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NIDLTDOAMeasurement/coordinates] is a triplet of the format (latitude, longitude, altitude).

## Identifying a coordinate type

- **NIDLTDOACoordinatesType.relative**: A coordinate type that specifies a 3D Cartesian triplet.
